data.name: RecipientInfo
desc: contains all information needed to send a message using one send protocol.
To send one message via two different protocols, two RecipientInfos are needed - to send one message to different users with one protocol, one RecipientInfo can be used.

properties.name: ProtocolType
desc: the protocol to use for sending (i.e.
\"NNTP\", \"SMTP\", \"VIM\").

properties.name: State
desc: the current state of the message.

properties.name: To
desc: the recipient(s) (e.g.
e-mail address/es).
Multiple addresses are separated by commas.

properties.name: CC
desc: the recipient(s) of a \"carbon copy\" (e.g.
e-mail address/es).
Multiple addresses are separated by commas.

properties.name: BCC
desc: the recipient(s) of \"blind carbon copy\" (e.g.
e-mail address/es).
Multiple addresses are separated by commas.

properties.name: Newsgroups
desc: the newsgroup(s) to which an article is be posted.
Multiple addresses are separated by commas.

properties.name: Server
desc: the name of the server to be used for sending the message.

properties.name: Username
desc: the user name to be used for authorizing on the send server.

properties.name: Password
desc: the password to be used for authorizing on the send server.

properties.name: VIMPostOfficePath
desc: the Post Office Path (VIM only).

properties.name: ProtocolErrorString
desc: string representing the last error (generated by send server).

properties.name: ProtocolErrorNumber
desc: the number representing the last error (generated by send server).

properties.name: SendTries
desc: the count of tries to send a message.
This count is 1 if the message was sent with the first try and increases with every unsuccessful retry.
